code: import React,{memo}from"react";import ActivityIndicator from"react-native-web/dist/exports/ActivityIndicator";import Alert from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Alert";import firebase from"firebase/app";import"firebase/auth";import Background from"../components/Background";import{theme}from"../core/theme";import{FIREBASE_CONFIG}from"../core/config";import Toast from'react-native-tiny-toast';if(!firebase.apps.length){firebase.initializeApp(FIREBASE_CONFIG);}var AuthLoadingScreen=function AuthLoadingScreen(_ref){var navigation=_ref.navigation;firebase.auth().onAuthStateChanged(function(user){if(user==null){navigation.navigate("HomeScreen");}else if(user.email=="admin@tnce.in"){navigation.navigate("AdminDashboard");Toast.show('Hi '+user.displayName);}else if(user){navigation.navigate("Dashboard");Toast.show('Hi '+user.displayName);}else{Toast.show('Please login now');}});return React.createElement(Background,null,React.createElement(ActivityIndicator,{size:"large",color:theme.colors.primary}));};export function Userlo(){var user=firebase.auth().currentUser;return user.uid;}export function Userloname(){var user=firebase.auth().currentUser;return user.displayName;}export default memo(AuthLoadingScreen);
